article_title: A face behind the name: Who are the people leading California’s largest nursing home chains?
article_text: Who are the people leading California’s largest chains? They are an eclectic bunch and generally come from backgrounds in real estate, investment banking, high finance and law rather than health care.

article_metadata.news-keywords: Nursing homes, California, Shlomo Rechnitz, Thomas Olds, Mark Ballif, Jacob Wintner, Ira Smedra, Mark Reagan

article_summary:
Who are the people leading California’s largest chains?
They are an eclectic bunch and generally come from backgrounds in real estate, investment banking, high finance and law rather than health care.
